post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Calling all IT Professionals and aspiring IT candidates!!!

AIM Computer Consulting LLC- A Michigan USA based company is looking for you!

We will be in CANADA to meet with IT professionals as well as aspiring IT consultants in person to go through the interview process as well as technical screening.

We are specifically looking for Interwoven, JAVA, BIZTALK, Sharepoint, DOTNET, SSIS, SQL DBA, AIX UNIX, Oracle Apps, Oracle HRMS candidates- both experienced and those candidates who would be interested in getting trained and becoming an IT consultant.

WHAT: USA IT JOB OPPORTUNITY- CANADA RECRUITING
WHEN: SEPTEMBER 27 2008
WHERE: HOTEL DELTA CHELSEA
33 GERRARD ST. WEST
TORONTO (DOWNTOWN), ONTARIO M5G 1Z4
TEL PHONE: 416- 995 -1975
ROOM: WHISTLER ROOM
TIME: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM


If you are interested to come- please feel free to send your resume at and or call me at 734 591 3500 x 121.

See you then!!!





Jennifer Dacia

Resource Manager

734 591 3500 x 121

Cellphone: 248 778 8471

AIM COMPUTER CONSULTING LLC
post.title: IT USA JOB OPPORTUNITY
